blankStep.name: 1_introduction_to_the_get_started_tab
blankStep.text:
Introduction to the Get Started tab

The Get Started tab is the first step in the On-Screen Data Entry process. This is where you will enter the Manufacturer Part Number and Name, as well as indicate whether you are offering a Product or Accessory. The information you enter here will be automatically transferred to subsequent tabs.

inputStep.name: 2_enter_the_manufacturer_part_number
inputStep.text:
Enter the Manufacturer Part Number.

Example: HSC0424PP
This field should be entered exactly as provided by the manufacturer, and should not be edited in any way. You can enter up to 40 characters, but only numbers and letters. Enter a Manufacturer Part Number below.

inputStep.name: 3_enter_the_manufacturer_part_name
inputStep.text:
Enter the Manufacturer Part Name.

Example: Honeywell, or Samsung, or DeWalt
The manufacturer name is the name of the original manufacturer of the product. Enter a name, using letters only, into the cell below.

buttonStep.name: 4_select_the_product_type
buttonStep.text:
Select the Product Type.

Double-click in the text box to reveal the drop-down menu and select Product

buttonStep.name: 5_select_the_product_type
buttonStep.text:
Select the Product Type.

Double-click in the text box to reveal the drop-down menu and select Product

buttonStep.name: 6_save_after_completing_each_row
buttonStep.text:
Save after completing each row.

Click the Save Products button frequently while filling out this tab. If you do not save your work, it will be lost.

buttonStep.name: 7_confirm_saved_products
buttonStep.text:
Confirm saved products.

When the Product Confirmation pop-up message appears, click OK.

blankStep.name: 8_complete_remaining_rows
blankStep.text:
Complete remaining rows.

Fill out the rest of your product information in the cells provided.

buttonStep.name: 9_save_your_work
buttonStep.text:
Save your work.

Before moving onto the next tab, you must click the Save Products button. If you click off of this tab before saving, all of your information will be lost.

buttonStep.name: 10_confirm_saved_products
buttonStep.text:
Confirm saved products.

When the Product Confirmation pop-up message appears, click OK

testStep.name: 11_check_your_knowledge
testStep.text:
What values are allowed in Manufacturer Part Numbers?

Once you have completed the Get Started tab and saved your information, you will be able to move on to the General tab to continue.
